comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: I love the Bitopoly v1 and wish I got one but didn't know about Squirrelbits until a couple months ago. Glad I was able to get my hands on a v2. The only thing that makes me nervous for the people with v1 is the Opendime... How many years will the Opendime last? Obviously we don't know but 15, 20 or even 25 years down the line those devices could succumb to "bitrot" and could be defunct.I don't think it's much to worry about but just a thought I had.Best,BTCOVERFIATS

There's a few other early liquid collectibles that I really want as well. Anyone feel free to DM me if they have anything cool available!
